amendment.description: Amendment makes changes to title I of the bill dealing with the sex offender registration and notification requirements and related issues.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in the Congressional Record making technical and conforming changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Sensenbrenner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
